speaker: Hunter
lines: You step into a small camp under a tarp.
A hunter sharpens a knife and looks up.
'Trail's busy today,' he says. 'Wolves on the move. Witch-sign to the west.'
He flips a tooth charm in his hand and offers guidance.
'If you go streamward, keep quiet. If you climb, keep pace.'
He studies you and nods once.
'Take a charm. Return it to a tree when you're done.'

give_item.name: Hunter's Charm
give_item.description: A tooth that doesn't mind being bitten
